Wondrous item, Uncommon
This simple tin and wood weathervane is shaped like a lightning bolt. It can be fitted onto the shoulder or helm.
Bearing this weathervane, you can reduce any lightning damage you take by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus. In addition, your weapon attacks deal an additional 1 lightning damage.
